thread.title: Craig
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Craig

author: Craig
title: Craig
text: Probably the best service I've experienced at any retailer, absolutely brilliant. Product was a great buy, arrived very quickly and communication was excellent throughout. I needed to return part of the order as I had bought different sizes and it was so simple, again with great service. In the end they collected from my house. Really impressed and shall definitely be a repeat customer
